html.h1: Welcome to the V2P Network Visibility App for Splunk!
html.p: IMPORTANT: This app relies on the NetFlow Optimizerâ„¢ (NFO) flow processing engine software by NetFlow Logic and also requires the Technology Add-On for NetFlow. Please see V2P Network Visibility Solution Guide document for additional information: https://www.netflowlogic.com/resources/documentation/

ul.li: Download and install Technology Add-On for NetFlow: https://splunkbase.splunk.com/app/1838/

Visit https://www.netflowlogic.com/download/ and download:
NetFlow Optimizer
External Data Feeder
V2P Network Visibility Module
Request a free 60 day NetFlow Optimizer trial license by completing the simple registration form
Install and configure NetFlow Optimizer input to receive NetFlow/sFlow/IPFIX, and output to send NFO syslogs to your Splunk system
Install External Data Feeder to connect NFO to VMware vCenter
Upload V2P Network Visibility Module to NFO and configure vCenter integration

html.p: For NetFlow Optimizer and External Data Feeder for NFO installation and configuration please see NetFlow Optimizer Installation and Administration Guide and External Data Feeder Getting Started Guide at https://www.netflowlogic.com/resources/documentation/
You can setup this app by following the steps below. Once you have reviewed the setup steps, click on the "Enable" button.

Check that the index is properly configured. In case you are not using default index=main to store NetFlow Optimizer events, please follow the following procedure:
Create directory $SPLUNK_ROOT/etc/apps/netflow_netops/local/ if it doesn't exist
Create file $SPLUNK_ROOT/etc/apps/netflow_netops/local/macros.conf with following lines:
[netflow_index] definition = index=<change_me> sourcetype=flowintegrator
Save $SPLUNK_ROOT/etc/apps/netflow_netops/local/macros.conf
Restart Splunk for the changes to take effect

p.a: Have questions or need assistance? We are here to help!
